attributes.action: Lower car insurance for first time driver
attributes.additional_details: This will help everyone to stop doing fronting  fraud and not pay the full amount but if you lower it to a reasonable price this would prevent all of this from happening
attributes.background: I want you to lower the car insurance as I think it’s an abused amount of money for a little car that’s costs £1000 and the insurance you charge is around £2-4K

rejection.details:
The Government isn't directly responsible for the price of car insurance, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653927

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
